Text: It's in English, what do you need subs for?
actually i m not so much good in english, thats why when i downloading any English torrent i prefer that with Eng.srt file,that's why.
ahh, i see... you can find the english subs online, but do you know how to hard code them into the movie?

yes i know,but online sub didn't work all the time properly,some time they have to synchronized,sometimes cant.whatever,thanks for reply,there are many up loaders who add srt file,i m also one of them.
